attributes.action: Referendum for Scottish Independence in 2012 (Scotland only)
attributes.additional_details:
Give the Scottish citizens a referendum on independence in the year 2012 instead of waiting several years.
Scotland has waiting to long for independence and shouldn't have to wait any longer. Scottish citizens should be giving the choice to stay in the "UK" or not. No English, Welsh or Irish referendum on our Independence. Our country, Our choice.
We've waited long enough. Give us our country back.
